sentences.sentence_tlingit: Kulix̱éitlʼshán wé eey.
sentences.sentence_english: The rapids are very scary.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Dax̱dahéen L’uknax̱.ádi áx’ héent wudzik’ít’. Wé Ltu.aa yaa kawudaayí a tóode wookoox̱u aa áwé.
sentences.sentence_english: Twice the L’uknax̱.ádi capsized there. This one boat travelled out of Lituya Bay when the tide had droppped.

lines.line_tlingit: Wé Ltu.aa yaa kawudaayí a tóode wookoox̱u aa áwé.
lines.line_english: This one boat travelled out of Lituya Bay when the tide had droppped.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Tlél tsú dleit ḵáa yá Aḻásgi awuskú.
sentences.sentence_english: No white man knew of Alaska.

lines.line_tlingit: Tlél tsú dleit ḵáa yá Aḻásgi awuskú.
lines.line_english: No white man knew of Alaska.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Tlé yú gusʼyát wulihásh at doogú daa.aax̱w.
sentences.sentence_english: The bundle of furs floated out to the face of the clouds.

lines.line_english: floated out to the face of the clouds.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Tlé yá pḻásdik gwéil ooyaa núch at naasí.
sentences.sentence_english: The intestines resembled a plastic bag.

lines.line_tlingit: Tlé yá pḻásdik gwéil ooyaa núch at naasí.
lines.line_english: The intestines resembled a plastic bag.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Xóots naasí.
sentences.sentence_english: Brown Bear intestines.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Tlé dulxáash tsú áwé s wóochde dusḵáa.
sentences.sentence_english: They are cut and sewn back together.

lines.line_tlingit: Tlé dulxáash tsú áwé s wóochde dusḵáa.
lines.line_english: They are cut and sewn back together.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: At naasí gwéil áwé wé at doogú; tlé yú gus’yát wulihásh Ltu.aa.
sentences.sentence_english: The intestinal bag of furs floated to the face of the clouds from Lituya Bay,

lines.line_tlingit: gwéil áwé wé at doogú; tlé yú gus’yát wulihásh Ltu.aa.
lines.line_english: bag of furs floated to the face of the clouds from Lituya Bay,

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Wé héench aan yéi ḵuwsineeyi át.
sentences.sentence_english: the ones the people drowned with.

lines.line_tlingit: Wé héench aan yéi ḵuwsineeyi át.
lines.line_english: the ones the people drowned with.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Ách áyá yá Aḻásgi kaadéi Anóoshi ḵuwashee.
sentences.sentence_english: This is why the Russians searched for Alaska.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Áyá a káx̱ ḵuwduwashee yá Aḻásgi káx’ Lingít.
sentences.sentence_english: That's how they found Tlingits in Alaska.

lines.line_tlingit: Áyá a káx̱ ḵuwduwashee yá Aḻásgi káx’ Lingít.
lines.line_english: That's how they found Tlingits in Alaska.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Hás tsú tlél tlél washéen has oo.oo, ch’a yéi s’ís’aa een át has wulis’ées.
sentences.sentence_english: They didn't have machines either they'd just sail with canvas.

lines.line_tlingit: tlél washéen has oo.oo, ch’a yéi

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Ltu.aanáx̱ s’é kei aawlis’ís Anóoshi yaagú.
sentences.sentence_english: A Russian boat first sailed into Lituya Bay.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Áwé Lingít l át yáx̱ sh koolneek.
sentences.sentence_english: And so the Tlingits didn't tell it like it really was.

lines.line_tlingit: Lingít l át yáx̱ sh koolneek.
lines.line_english: the Tlingits didn't tell it like it really was.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Yéil yaagú áyú.
sentences.sentence_english: It was the Raven boat,

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Yóo áyú kdunéek wooch een, Yéil yaagú.
sentences.sentence_english: was what they told one another, the Raven boat.

lines.line_english: was what they told one another,

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Yú Anóoshi áyú yéi yaa kanduník.
sentences.sentence_english: That's what they were saying about the Russians.

lines.line_tlingit: Yú Anóoshi áyú yéi yaa kanduník.
lines.line_english: That's what they were saying about the Russians.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Wudusteení tle téix̱ yoo ḵug̱ux̱sateek.
sentences.sentence_english: If you looked directly at it you would turn to stone.

lines.line_english: If you looked directly at it you would turn to stone.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Ch’u yeedát yéi yatee yá Lingít.
sentences.sentence_english: Even today the Tlingits are like that.

lines.line_tlingit: Ch’u yeedát yéi yatee yá Lingít.
lines.line_english: Even today the Tlingits are like that.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Awé yóot’át s’áxt’. A tóonáx̱ kukawduwatúl ḵa ketlháatl’i gwéil yáx̱ wduwaḵáa ḵa yátx’i náa a tóo yéi wduwa.oo.
sentences.sentence_english: And that devil's club. They drilled holes in them and dog droppings were sewn like bags and put into their children's clothes.

lines.line_tlingit: gwéil yáx̱ wduwaḵáa ḵa yátx’i náa

lines.line_english: and put into their children's clothes.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Tléi téix̱ yoo ḵug̱ux̱sateek.
sentences.sentence_english: You would turn to stone.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Yóo áwé Lingít aadéi yaa sh kagalnikch’i yé.
sentences.sentence_english: That's the way the Tlingits talked about this.

lines.line_tlingit: Yóo áwé Lingít aadéi yaa sh kagalnikch’i yé.
lines.line_english: That's the way the Tlingits talked about this.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Wé s’íksh, á ḵu.a áwé a tóonáx̱ ḵukawduwatúl, k’e i tunax̱kudutées’ yáx̱. A tóonáx̱ áwé dultínch wé Ltu.aanáx̱ kei klas’ées’. Hél téix̱ ḵugux̱satee aag̱áa.
sentences.sentence_english: This blue hellebore was hollowed through though, let's see, like binoculars. As it sailed into Lituya Bay they looked at it through these. Then they wouldn't turn to stone.

lines.line_tlingit: á ḵu.a áwé a tóonáx̱ ḵukawduwatúl,

lines.line_english: As it sailed into Lituya Bay
they looked at it through these.
Then they wouldn't turn to stone.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Ketlháatl’i tsú ḵaa séix̱ yawduwaḵáa.
sentences.sentence_english: Dog droppings too were hung around children's necks.

lines.line_english: Dog droppings too were hung around children's necks.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: S’áxt’ ḵu.a áwé yéi kwdagei tsú a tóonáx̱ ḵukawduwatúl.
sentences.sentence_english: But the larger devil's club had holes drilled through them too.

lines.line_english: had holes drilled through them too.

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Ḵáa yátx’i séi yei duwa.óo.
sentences.sentence_english: They were put on the necks of their children.

lines.line_english: They were put on the necks

sentences.sentence_tlingit: Aadé yóo at kaawaniyi yé shukát wé shgóona shudultee nóok.
sentences.sentence_english: That's the way things happened in the beginning when they awaited the schooner.

lines.line_tlingit: Aadé yóo at kaawaniyi yé shukát wé shgóona shudultee nóok.
lines.line_english: That's the way things happened in the beginning when they awaited the schooner.
